<!--Metadata/-->
<!--AutoGenerated-->
Text: "When inspecting a set of physical redo log files in a multi-file transaction log setup, the server was not able to find the main redo log, indexed 0 (zero). The reason for this indicates that the main redo log file have been tampered with on the server, either it has been deleted or moved."
<!--AutoGenerated/-->
